data.decision: Position Duro as philosophy-led product: "The Builder's operating system" not just "memory for AI agents"
data.rationale: Builder's Compass philosophy (verify, compose, remember) maps directly to Duro features. Philosophy-led positioning creates differentiation Mem0/Zep can't copy - you can clone features but not identity. Attracts builders who resonate, builds movement not just user base. Content marketing writes itself around the philosophy.
